```{r, echo=F, message=F, include=F}
devtools::load_all(".")
source('../code/plot.R')
c(0) %>% mami.codi()
```

```{r, echo=T}
chord = c(60, 72) %>% mami.codi(verbose=T, num_harmonics=4)
```

```{r, echo=F}
chord %>% dplyr::select(consonance_dissonance, major_minor)
```

#### Frequency

```{r, echo=F}
chord$ratios_frequency[[1]] %>% dplyr::rename(freq=pitch) %>% dplyr::arrange(freq)
```

```{r, echo=F}
sort(unique(chord$ratios_frequency[[1]]$den))
lcm(chord$ratios_frequency[[1]]$den)
```

#### Wavelength
 
```{r, echo=F}
chord$ratios_wavelength[[1]] %>% dplyr::rename(wavelength=pitch) %>% dplyr::arrange(wavelength)
```

```{r, echo=F}
sort(unique(chord$ratios_wavelength[[1]]$den))
lcm(chord$ratios_wavelength[[1]]$den)
```
